Class Block

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Block

public class Block
extends greenfoot.Actor

The class for all the blocks in the game. 0‘d’ designates dirt 1‘c’ designates cobble stone 2‘i’ designates iron ore block 4‘g’ designates gold ore block 3‘s’ designates silver ore block 5‘a’ designates diamond block 6‘e’ designates emerald ore block 7 'l' designates lapis ore block

Version:
(January 2015)
Author:
(Tyler Zhang)

Constructor Summary
Block()
          Construct a block with default type.

          Construct a block with a type.

 void damage()
          Do defualt damage to the block, take away 1 hp.

          Do a certain hamage to the block, take away a certain hp.
 void highlight(boolean green)
          Highlight the current block with red or green.
